LanguageData.GD_Sabertooth.label: combat blade
LanguageData.GD_Sabertooth.description: A "Sabertooth" combat blade of Greydale Defence. Good for chop down trees or enemies limbs.

LanguageData.YP_BingJu.label: Vibrosword
LanguageData.YP_BingJu.description: Light but extremely sharp, the "BingJu(Ice pillar)" is the close combat weapon of Yunhwa Precision's private army.

LanguageData.YP_BingJu.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.YP_BingJu.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.JI_Ormbane.label: Assault hammer
LanguageData.JI_Ormbane.description: "Ormbane" is a massive combat sledge hammer that manufactured from Jotun Interstellar.
LanguageData.JI_Ormbane.tools.0.label: handle

LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_TorchSword.label: torch sword
